scan_metadata.description: cloudfront - Compliance Functions Mapping - OPTIMIZED VERSION
scan_metadata.optimization_notes: Intelligently categorized functions by cloud security expert analysis, grouped by service, simplified to 4 clear categories with execution types and remediation effort classification

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check custom SSL certificate
check_functions.description: Checks if custom SSL certificate is configured

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check default root object
check_functions.description: Checks if default root object is set

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check field-level encryption
check_functions.description: Checks if field-level encryption is enabled

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check geo restrictions
check_functions.description: Checks if geo restrictions are enabled

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check HTTPS settings
check_functions.description: Checks if HTTPS is enabled for distributions

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check SNI settings
check_functions.description: Checks if SNI is enabled for HTTPS

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check logging settings
check_functions.description: Checks if logging is enabled for distributions

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check origin failover configuration
check_functions.description: Checks if multiple origin failover is configured

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check origin traffic encryption
check_functions.description: Checks if origin traffic is encrypted

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check S3 origin access control
check_functions.description: Checks S3 origin access control for distributions

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check S3 origin bucket existence
check_functions.description: Checks if S3 origin bucket exists

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check SSL protocols
check_functions.description: Checks if deprecated SSL protocols are used

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check WAF usage
check_functions.description: Checks if WAF is used for distributions

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check CSP policy
Code Executable - API call to check SRI settings
check_functions.description: Checks if SRI is enabled for distributions

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check security headers
Code Executable - API call to check script integrity
